title: An Essential Guide to the Virgo Zodiac Sign

steps.content: Dates: August 23-September 22 Element: Earth Modality: Mutable [1] X Research source Birthstones: Peridot (August) and Sapphire (September) Color: Brown, green, and blue Symbol: Maiden Ruling Planet: Mercury [2] X Research source Famous Virgos: Beyoncé, Keanu Reeves, Idris Elba, Zendaya, Salma Hayek, Chris Pine, Melissa McCarthy

steps.title: Virgos are hardworking.
steps.content: Virgos are hardworking. Virgos have a very strong work ethic. They’re often described as diligent and conscientious, and they have a strong desire to excel in whatever they’re doing. Driven and dedicated, Virgos will put in the effort needed to deliver high-quality results. [3] X Research source

steps.title: They’re analytical and detail-oriented.
steps.content: They’re analytical and detail-oriented. Virgos are known for their analytical minds and attention to detail. [4] X Research source They’re great at breaking down complex problems, identifying patterns, and finding practical solutions. Virgos’ meticulous nature allows them to notice even the smallest details.

steps.title: They’re reliable and responsible.
steps.content: They’re reliable and responsible. Virgos are very dependable and loyal. They always strive to keep promises and take responsibility for their actions. Their strong work ethic makes them dependable employees, and they’ll stick with their loved ones through thick and thin. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Virgos are patient.
steps.content: Virgos are patient. Virgos are one of the most patient signs of the zodiac. They strive to see the best in people and are willing to give others time and space to shape up their act. Virgos give people the benefit of the doubt and will usually forgive slip-ups. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Virgos are humble.
steps.content: Virgos are humble. Virgos are humble creatures who prefer to let their actions speak for themselves. While they’re extremely talented, they rarely seek attention or validation from others. Virgos often prefer to support others without seeking credit. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Virgos can be overly critical.
steps.content: Virgos can be overly critical. One of Virgo’s biggest weaknesses is that they tend to be overly critical and picky. Virgos are perfectionists, and because they’re so detail-oriented, they can find fault in almost anything. [8] X Research source Because they hold themselves to such high standards, they sometimes don’t realize their criticisms can hurt others’ feelings.

steps.title: They’re sometimes judgmental.
steps.content: They’re sometimes judgmental. Because of their critical nature, Virgos often make snap judgments about people and situations. Once they make a decision about something, it’s hard to change their mind. Because of their judgment, it’s sometimes difficult for Virgos to make new friends. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Virgos are known to be obsessive.
steps.content: Virgos are known to be obsessive. The downside of Virgo’s detail-oriented nature is that they often aren’t satisfied until every little detail is perfect. Their need for perfection often leads them to put unnecessary pressure and unrealistic expectations on themselves, which can negatively affect their mental health. They have a hard time letting things go. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Virgos are controlling.
steps.content: Virgos are controlling. Virgos always want the best results possible, and often, they think their way is the only way. [11] X Research source They have trouble trusting others to get the job done and always like to be in control. They tend to micromanage, which can lead to frustration in both their personal and professional relationships.

steps.title: They’re prone to anxiety and overthinking.
steps.content: They’re prone to anxiety and overthinking. Because Virgos are so intelligent, their minds are constantly working and can become overactive. This often leads to worry, anxiety, and insomnia. As perfectionists, they have a hard time letting go and constantly think about what could go wrong. [12] X Research source

steps.title: Virgos like order and structure.
steps.content: Virgos like order and structure. Virgos tend to be very organized people. They believe everything has a place and can become stressed if anything is out of place. They’re also neat, don’t like clutter, and love to clean. Virgos often have very systematic routines for almost everything in their life. [13] X Research source

steps.title: They enjoy deep conversations.
steps.content: They enjoy deep conversations. Virgos are highly intellectual, and they prefer connection with people on a deeper level. They prefer friends and partners who can engage in meaningful conversations. While they’re not much for small talk, they often love having conversations about all kinds of topics, including art, food, and literature. [14] X Research source

steps.title: They love spending time outdoors.
steps.content: They love spending time outdoors. Virgos are earth signs, so it’s no surprise they’re fond of nature. They often find peace and feel most relaxed when they’re outside enjoying the sunshine. They’re especially good at gardening, but it doesn’t matter what activity they’re doing as long as it’s in the fresh air. [15] X Research source

steps.title: Virgos don’t like liars.
steps.content: Virgos don’t like liars. Virgos are very honest people who take pride in being truthful and trustworthy. They don’t feel comfortable lying, and they dislike being lied to. Because they prefer open communication, there’s nothing Virgos dislike more than feeling manipulated or deceived. [16] X Research source

steps.title: They’re not fond of attention.
steps.content: They’re not fond of attention. While Virgos are talented perfectionists, they don’t often feel the need to be recognized for their talents. They don’t usually like crowds, and they prefer to stay in the background rather than being the center of attention. [17] X Research source

steps.title: They don’t like rudeness.
steps.content: They don’t like rudeness. Virgos are known to be refined and courteous, so they’re not fans of impoliteness. [18] X Research source They don’t like being treated rudely or being around people who aren’t genuine. Virgos usually dislike vulgar behavior and prefer to be around people they think are respectful.

steps.title: Virgos are loyal, communicative partners.
steps.content: Virgos are loyal, communicative partners. As in all aspects of their lives, Virgos are loyal, detail-oriented, and practical when it comes to love and relationships. [19] X Research source They often express their affection through acts of service and open communication rather than grand, romantic gestures. They’re sometimes slow to fall in love, but when they do, they’re devoted. If you want to know more about what it’s like to date a Virgo, check out our forum “Dating a Virgo Man.”

steps.title: Virgos remember the little things about people they like.
steps.content: Virgos remember the little things about people they like. Virgos are subtle flirts, but you’ll know one is interested in you if they remember small details about you. They’ll recall little things you’ve mentioned in previous conversations, like your favorite color or your preferred coffee order. Virgos pay attention to things they care about—in this case, you. [20] X Research source Sometimes, it’s hard to know if a Virgo likes you. According to astrologer Stina Garbis, “Virgos will stare at you from afar and follow you, somehow without you knowing for some time if they’re into you. If you make yourself open and available… that might get a shy and receptive sign like Virgo to approach.”

steps.title: Virgos are very sensual lovers.
steps.content: Virgos are very sensual lovers. In the bedroom, Virgos often take things slow to deliver maximum pleasure to their partner. They’re very attentive and put their partner’s needs first. They’re open to exploring new positions and fantasies, but ultimately seek intimacy and emotional connection. [21] X Research source

steps.title: To seduce a Virgo, don’t come off too strong.
steps.content: To seduce a Virgo, don’t come off too strong. Virgos are very practical people, so they’re not usually impressed by grand romantic gestures. They may feel uncomfortable if someone hits on them too aggressively, so it’s best to play it cool. Take your time getting to know them before expressing your intention to date them. Flirt with some witty banter to show them you can keep up with them intellectually. [22] X Research source According to Garbis, Virgos are attracted to “Cleanliness and good hygiene—they want you to smell good and look good. Be smart and witty, but not smarter than them. Be a good listener and a good follower.”

steps.title: Taurus.
steps.content: Taurus. Virgo and Taurus are an ideal match according to zodiac compatibility. Taurus and Virgo are both earth signs, and they’re four signs apart on the astrological chart, which is a harmonious angle. Both signs are grounded and pragmatic, and the sensual Taurus will pamper Virgo, while Virgo will enjoy caring for their Taurus. [23] X Research source If you’re not sure if a Taurus likes you, Garbis says, “Taurus tends to keep their social circle small to family and a few friends. It is hard to break in. If a Taurus is going out of their way to spend any time with you at all and is trying to invite you into that circle, then that is a sign there’s some interest.”

steps.title: Cancer.
steps.content: Cancer. While Virgo and Cancer have their differences, they’re both inherently caring and give each other what they need in a relationship. They balance each other out; Virgo offers Cancer the security and support they crave, while Cancer helps Virgo channel their emotions. [24] X Research source As a Virgo, if you want a Cancer to fall for you, Garbis suggests, “Let them take care of you… They love to emotionally support others. Cook together and eat meals with them.”

steps.title: Capricorn.
steps.content: Capricorn. Virgo and Capricorn are another great match. Capricorn is career-oriented, ambitious, and responsible, which is ideal for Virgo, who craves a partner who knows what they want. Both signs value structure and routine, and together, they can build a lasting relationship. [25] X Research source If you want to attract a Capricorn, Garbis recommends that you “Become part of Capricorn’s close circle… I would start small with asking for help, like helping with a car or some small household ‘emergency.’” Learn more about Virgo/Capricorn compatibility by checking out our forum “Do Virgos and Capricorns have good compatibility?”

steps.title: Gemini.
steps.content: Gemini. One of the signs least compatible with Virgo is Gemini. Gemini and Virgo are both mutable signs, but this can sometimes cause more harm than good. Because of their modality, both signs are indecisive. They often frustrate each other by mirroring these tendencies. Virgo may also be too meticulous and practical for the free-spirited Gemini, while Gemini may be too flighty for Virgo, who prefers stability. [26] X Research source

steps.title: Sagittarius.
steps.content: Sagittarius. While Sagittarius and Virgo initially connect on an intellectual level, it can be difficult for them to maintain a relationship. As a fire sign, Sagittarius craves freedom and independence in all aspects of life, while Virgo wants a partner who can offer them security. Virgo may be too critical for the moody Sagittarius. [27] X Research source

steps.title: Aquarius.
steps.content: Aquarius. Though Aquarius and Virgo are both intellectuals, that’s about all they have in common. Aquarius is an air sign that values freedom and prefers to go with the flow, while Virgo is stable and requires structure to feel secure. Aquarius also tends to daydream a lot, and Virgo prefers a partner with stronger communication skills. [28] X Research source

steps.title: Virgos are loyal and reliable friends.
steps.content: Virgos are loyal and reliable friends. Virgos take friendship very seriously and will drop what they’re doing to help a friend in need. They encourage and inspire their friends to live up to their potential and help them come up with practical solutions to their problems. However, Virgos tend to put up walls to protect themselves, so it often takes them a long time to open up and develop a true friendship. [29] X Research source Because Virgos are so loyal, they expect the same from their friends. They don’t do well with flakiness and want their friends to support them wholeheartedly.

steps.title: Virgos and Scorpios make great friends.
steps.content: Virgos and Scorpios make great friends. Virgo and Scorpio may seem different, but those differences help balance each other out. Virgo helps keep the intense Scorpio grounded, while Scorpio helps pull Virgo out of their comfort zone. They both take friendship seriously and value commitments. They also both need time to unwind by themselves, so they won’t get upset if the other turns down an invitation. [30] X Research source Garbis says, “Virgos have a natural pull towards secretive Scorpio. They like to unravel mysteries and have a few of their own.” This applies to both friendships and romantic relationships.

steps.title: A friendship between Virgo and Aries can be awkward.
steps.content: A friendship between Virgo and Aries can be awkward. Virgo and Aries have little in common, so it may be hard for them to connect. Aries tend to leap into things without thinking, while Virgos are more methodical and practical. [31] X Research source This often causes them to butt heads. They often have completely different interests, so they may struggle to find things they enjoy doing together. This doesn’t mean an Aries/Virgo friendship is impossible. Aries needs to be patient with Virgo’s perfectionism and fussy nature, while Virgo needs to learn to step out of their comfort zone.

steps.title: Virgos prefer careers where they can be in control.
steps.content: Virgos prefer careers where they can be in control. Virgos are extremely organized and detail-oriented, so they don’t do well in chaotic jobs with constantly changing priorities. They prefer to be in control of their work and their environment, and they need clear directions and expectations to do their best work. [32] X Research source Best careers: college professor, museum curator, systems analyst, IT expert, librarian, designer Challenging careers: waiter, psychic, police officer, hairstylist [33] X Research source

steps.title: Virgos are hard workers and team players.
steps.content: Virgos are hard workers and team players. Virgos love nothing more than throwing themselves into their projects. They often lead by example and demand excellence from themselves and others. They work well in teams, as they don’t like or cause drama, but they often prefer to do most of their work alone. Because they’re so focused, they often struggle with multitasking and do well when they can be their own boss. [34] X Research source If a Virgo is struggling with tasks at work, they may want to implement a schedule so they spend an ample amount of time on each assignment. Virgos also do well with remote careers where they don’t have to worry about distractions in the office.

steps.title: Virgos are good at saving money.
steps.content: Virgos are good at saving money. Because Virgos are intelligent and practical, they’re generally good at saving money. However, they sometimes want to spend impulsively. While they don’t buy things to impress others, Virgos generally have expensive taste and like to treat themselves. They’ll never spend more than what they have, though. [35] X Research source

steps.title: Learn to be more adaptable.
steps.content: Learn to be more adaptable. If you’re a Virgo, you likely feel most at ease when things are going according to plan. However, life can be unpredictable, so it’s important to learn to go with the flow. Accept that some things are out of your control and embrace spontaneity. Don’t be afraid to adjust your plans when necessary. [36] X Research source

steps.title: Allow yourself to be a beginner.
steps.content: Allow yourself to be a beginner. As a Virgo, you’re likely a perfectionist who expects high-quality results from everything you do. You may get discouraged if you aren’t automatically great at something. Remember, even experts were once beginners. Don’t be afraid to fail; in the end, you’ll likely learn more than if you were already good at something. Learn new hobbies to help soften your rigid mindset. [37] X Research source To stop worrying about perfectionism, life coach Sandra Possing challenges her clients “to let go of the need to have the perfect plan and instead just start trying to trust their own desires and their own intuition. Then, try something like taking a painting workshop, taking a dance class, or signing up to volunteer… to get into action.”

steps.title: Practice mindfulness.
steps.content: Practice mindfulness. Virgos may easily become overwhelmed and anxious, but there are some things you can do to soothe your over-active mind. Set some time aside each day to practice mindfulness. Try meditating or doing yoga, and try to acknowledge your thoughts without judging them. Journaling is another great way to take control of your thoughts. [38] X Research source To incorporate mindfulness into your work day, life coach Michael Stern recommends, “Schedule a short ‘recovery break’ at the mid-morning and mid-afternoon points of the day to do a quick mindfulness exercise, which could include breathing, listening to music, getting some fresh air, gentle stretching, etc.”

steps.title: Create a work-life balance.
steps.content: Create a work-life balance. If you’re a Virgo, you’re probably a hard worker, but sometimes, this means you bring your work home with you. To avoid getting stressed or burnt out, it’s important to maintain a clear work-life balance. Avoid working overtime and prioritize self-care and spending time with your loved ones. If it helps, make a weekly schedule to ensure you take enough time for your enjoyment. [39] X Research source
